It's 1:30 PM at the Yaroslavsky train station in Moscow.
The train number 2, the famous Trans-Siberian Express...
A one-week journey across the world's largest country...
...that gives us a unique opportunity to discover Russia off the beaten path.
The Trans-Siberian Express is a train like no other, a legend.
It's the longest rail line in the world,...
It is the pride of Russia.
